rotate(float).Description: Modifies the upper 2x2 of the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a rotation matrix of given angle

loadTranslate(float, float).Description: Sets current values to be a translation matrix of given dimensions

transpose().Description: Sets the current matrix to its transpose

getArray().Description: Return a reference to the internal array representing matrix values. Modifying this array will also change the matrix

loadMultiply(android.support.v8.rendersc.Description: Sets current values to be the result of multiplying two given matrices

loadScale(float, float, float).Description: Sets current values to be a scale matrix of given dimensions
loadScale(float, float, float).FullName: void loadScale (float x, float y, float z)

Parameters: float: values to set the matrix to, must be 9 floats long
Matrix3f(float[]).Description: Creates a new matrix and sets its values from the given parameter

Returns: value in the yth row and xth column
Parameters: int: column of the value to return
int: row of the value to return
get(int, int).Description: Returns the value for a given row and column

translate(float, float).Description: Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a translation matrix of given dimensions

scale(float, float, float).Description: Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a scale matrix of given dimensions
scale(float, float, float).FullName: void scale (float x, float y, float z)

Parameters: int: column of the value to set
int: row of the value to set
set(int, int, float).Description: Sets the value for a given row and column
set(int, int, float).FullName: void set (int x, int y, float v)

loadRotate(float).Description: Makes the upper 2x2 a rotation matrix of the given angle

Parameters: Matrix3f: right hand side to multiply by
multiply(android.support.v8.renderscript.Description: Post-multiplies the current matrix by a given parameter

loadIdentity().Description: Sets the matrix values to identity

scale(float, float).Description: Modifies the upper 2x2 of the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a scale matrix of given dimensions

rotate(float, float, float, float).Description: Modifies the current matrix by post-multiplying it with a rotation matrix of certain angle about a given axis
rotate(float, float, float, float).FullName: void rotate (float rot, float x, float y, float z)

loadRotate(float, float, float, float).Description: Sets current values to be a rotation matrix of certain angle about a given axis
loadRotate(float, float, float, float).FullName: void loadRotate (float rot, float x, float y, float z)

loadScale(float, float).Description: Makes the upper 2x2 a scale matrix of given dimensions

Parameters: Matrix3f: matrix to load the values from
load(android.support.v8.renderscript.Mat.Description: Sets the values of the matrix to those of the parameter

ClassDesc: Class for exposing the native RenderScript rs_matrix3x3 type back to the Android system.
